thread.section_title: Avas Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Avas Flowers | avasflowers.com | 14 of 317
thread.title: Lorraine

author: Lorraine
title: Lorraine
text: I ordered the Charming Pink Bouquet and what was delivered was quite the opposite - red, orange and purple??? I called to express my dissatisfaction and was on hold for over 28 minutes. They didn't know what went wrong and couldn't give a good explanation - no one understands anything there! They offered a $20 discount for my next order and I told them there will NOT be a next order I just wanted the right ordered delivered. Then they said they would deliver the correct order and pick up the order that wasn't right. I told them no way. The person that I had the flowers send to was recuperating from surgery and could NOT be playing their exchange game. I got so disgusted, I hung up. I will be contacting my bank to cancel payment if possible. Please do NOT order from Ava's flowers!!!
